## The Openscapes Flywheel

* New preprint describing a framework for managers to facilitate/scale OS practices: [link](https://eartharxiv.org/repository/view/4560/)
* Useful examples and metaphor for adopting OS at the institutional level
     * Engage bright spots
     * Empower a learning culture
     * Amplify Open science leaders
* Slow down to speed up!

## TRASH FREE WATERS (TFW)

-   An EPA initiative to reduce trash entering surface waters by preventing waste at its source
-   TBEP has been implementing a [TFW initiative](https://tbep.org/our-work/education/trash-free-waters/) since 2019 with five partners
-   Will result in a [Litter Management Plan](https://tbep.org/our-work/education/trash-free-waters/#plan)

![](figure/litterdevices.jpg)

## CCHA UPDATES

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}

-   Monitor transition zones from shoreline to uplands at ten locations
-   Repeat surveys every 3-5 years for next few decades

## QUARTO

-   An open-source scientific and technical publishing system
-   Recently unveiled earlier this year
    -   [We don't talk about Quarto](https://www.apreshill.com/blog/2022-04-we-dont-talk-about-quarto/)
    -   [Quarto at RStudio Conference](https://quarto.org/docs/blog/posts/2022-06-21-rstudio-conf-2022-quarto/)
-   A successor to RMarkdown - language agnostic (works with R, Python, Julia, and Observable)
<br>
<br>
